page.title: 15LIBRARY.
page.content: The library was prepared and loaned by R.A.F.Coningsby and opened in 1978.{In the library they have 7000 {books and 4300 adult members and 2000 {children. In March 85 the adults books {loaned were 26,982 and childrens 6262. Mrs. Emmett has been in the library since 1979.{In the library they have {largeprint for the people who can not {see very well.}They are only open four days a week, Tuesdays & Thursdays for six and a half hours, Fridays and Saturdays for three hours.{Also in the {library they have talking books.The {Dewy catlogue is on microfilm. As well as books Mrs.Emmett keeps all the telephone directories parish magazines cuttings from papers,minutes of local and district council meetings,bus and train timetables, details of aspects of local history and social events.
